column1: kathy suffers from a rare genetic disease called hht . <eos> kathy warned her dentist that she needed to have antibiotics . <eos> the dentist had never heard of hht so he would n't prescribe them . <eos> an infection moved from kathy 's mouth to her brain during dental work . <eos> kathy was admitted to the er and needed to have brain surgery .

betty had come by annie 's home for dinner . <eos> she mentioned that she wanted to see the quilt annie had finished . <eos> after dinner , annie showed her the quilt . <eos> betty complimented her on the pattern and _UNK . <eos> encouraged by betty 's remarks , annie entered the quilt in a contest .
